channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- W-DALIL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- W-DALIL

item.title: CVE-2022-2340|2024-08-03T00:32:09.356Z -- unknown -- w-dalil
item.description: The W-DALIL WordPress plugin through 2.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its fields, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
